MAJOR FEATURE REQUEST (4 separate submissions): Merge 3 pages into unified experience:
  1. index.html#features (main features section)
  2. workspace-v3.html (workspace interface)
  3. Netlify deploy preview

User wants consolidated UI without duplicate functionality. This is a significant UX redesign requiring:
  - Feature inventory/audit
  - UI/UX design for unified page
  - Careful deduplication
  - Testing to ensure no functionality lost

Recommendation: Requires Commander decision on design direction and priority.
